align:
\begin{align}\label{Q}
  \hat{\mathcal{Q}}_1 & = e^{-\hat{\phi}} \star (d \hat{B}) = Q H \, d \Omega_7 \,, \notag \\
  \hat{\mathcal{Q}}_0 & = e^{3\hat{\phi}/2} \star (d \hat{A} - m \hat{B}) = Q \, dy \wedge d \Omega_7 \,,
\

\begin{align}
  \mathcal{Q}_1{}^r & = e^{-\varphi/\sqrt{7}} \mathcal{M}^{r}{}_{s} \star (d B^s) 
    = q_1{}^r \mathcal{Q}_1 \,, \notag \\
  \mathcal{Q}_0{}^r & = e^{3 \varphi/\sqrt{7}} \mathcal{M}^{r}{}_{s} \star (d A^s - M^s{}_t B^t) 
    = q_0{}^r \mathcal{Q}_0 \,.
\

\begin{align}
  M_{rs} = \tfrac{1}{2} \left(\begin{array}{cc} -m'_2 + m'_3 & m'_1 \\
   m'_1  & m'_2 + m'_3 \end{array}\right) = 
  \tfrac{1}{2} \left(\begin{array}{cc} q^2 \mu_1 + s^2 \mu_2 & -pq \mu_1 - rs \mu_2 \\
    -pq \mu_1 - rs \mu_2 & p^2 \mu_1 + r^2 \mu_2 \end{array}\right) \,.
\label{mass}
\
